title: Introducing: Dreamspook
content:
Minneapolis’s Gabriel Jorgensen was somewhat of a blog-buzz artist a few years back under his Ancient Mariner alias.

Now, in true blog-worthy style, he’s undergone a rebrand of sorts, and is stepping out as Dreamspook, with a resoundingly more confident sound. The songwriting is bolder and more admirably tumultuous, merging seamlessly psych-pop elements from the likes of UMO and Tame Impala, Fear In Love manages to feel like the perfect introductory track, leaving a real excitement for the direction of the full nine track release expected later this year. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
